mapper.insert: INSERT INTO job (no,member_nickname,job_comment,job_pay,latitude,longitude,road_address,address,detail_address,job_name,member_phone,job_num,job_option,job_date,job_time_start,job_time_end, board_date) VALUES (job_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{member_nickname}, #{job_comment}, #{job_pay},#{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{road_address}, #{address}, #{detail_address}, #{job_name}, #{member_phone}, #{job_num}, #{job_option}, #{job_date}, #{job_time_start}, #{job_time_end}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM job where no in (select no from applyInfo where member_nickname=#{member_nickname})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM applyInfo where no=#{no} and member_nickname=#{member_nickname}
